name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Start Screen: A beautiful New Tab with news.

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A beautiful New Tab Chrome extension that keeps you informed and provides momentum in news, business and finance.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Freshen up each New Tab with Start Screen: A beautiful and elegant New Tab experience, showing you incredible images and up-to-date, business-focused news snippets. Whether you're a fan of Momentum, Tabliss, or looking for something new, this is your Start Screen â€” clean, simple, and always delivering the most up-to-date news.

Each New Tab screen will show you a news headline. If you're interested, move your mouse over and read a little more. Just like that, you'll be up to date!
